cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(com, cina)
-| wb(wcel(com, cina), w3a(wne(com, emptycls), wceq(cfv(ccf, com), com), wral(hs0, com, wbr(cpw(cv(hs0)), csdm, com))))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), com), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfn))
-| wb(wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfn), wbr(cpw(cv(hs0)), csdm, com))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ _om ∈ Inacc
⊣ (_om ∈ Inacc ↔(_om ≠ ∅ ∧(cf ` _om)= _om ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ _om, P(hs0)[≺]_om)))
⊣ (hs0 ∈ _om → P(hs0)∈ Fin)
⊣ (P(hs0)∈ Fin ↔ P(hs0)[≺]_om)

⊣ (hs0 ∈ _om → hs0 ∈ Fin)

comment: ` _om ` is a strongly inaccessible cardinal. (Many definitions of "inaccessible" explicitly disallow ` _om ` as an inaccessible cardinal, but this choice allows us to reuse our results for inaccessibles for ` _om ` .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2014.)
